Name: Noble's Courtesy
Description: You have sworn an oath to serve the local nobility with utmost respect and priority.

Name: Merchant's Priority
Description: Your reputation with the Trade Guild grants you better compensation for commercial deliveries.

Name: Shadow's Burden
Description: You have accepted the dangerous but lucrative world of clandestine deliveries.

Name: Patron's Expectation
Description: Your mysterious patron has made their expectations clear - their letters take precedence above all.

Name: Heart's Bond
Description: Your romantic commitment provides emotional support but creates social obligations.

Name: Common Folk's Friend
Description: You are known as a reliable friend to the working people of the region.
